advice: Do NOT skip week 5 and 6 vectors content. The End Term is 40% Eigenvalues. Practice solving 3x3 matrices by hand for speed.
It's all about flowcharts and graph theory. The mock tests are exactly like the real exams. Easy S grade if you don't make silly mistakes.
The theory is easy, but the OPPE is the real killer. You need to type code fast. Practice on Replit or the OPPE Dojo here every day.
This is arguably the hardest foundation course. Hypothesis testing concepts are confusing. Watch external YouTube playlists (StatQuest) to survive.
Very theoretical. Good for boosting CGPA. Just read the slides and you'll be fine.
